alert.note: Alert for Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 05 at 3:43PM CDT until June 05 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of north central Kansas, including the following county, Rooks. * WHEN...Until 645 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 343 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported heavy rain in Stockton due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is already occurring. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Stockton is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Stockton and Woodston. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
